summary: A password-protected website named 'Bittu Kadai' with sleek UI that displays C++ programming experiments with copy/share buttons. Features a 3-attempt login system with 5-minute timeout, developer profile section for JoshNvrDie with Instagram link, and focuses on responsive, user-friendly design with updated color scheme.
architectural_notes: Client-side password validation for fast access
LocalStorage for tracking login attempts and timeout
Code snippets displayed with syntax highlighting for readability
Developer profile includes profile picture display capability
